name: news_list_flash
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool webull.
Tool description: Query public data for investment products including stocks, fractional shares, options, ETFs, and ADRs as on webull.com
API description: Fetches a list of flash news articles using the Webull API.

currentnewsid.description: For paging purposes, this is the ID of the last news returned by this endpoint. Pass 0 for the first query. Defaults to 0.

pagesize.description: For paging purposes, this parameter specifies the maximum number of news articles to return. The maximum value is 20. Defaults to 20.
